players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed she's mafia. We need to vote her out immediately."
You: "That's a lie, Bob. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night - you're the mafioso. Diana, don't believe him."
Diana: "I need to hear more from both of you before deciding. Bob, what made you investigate Alice specifically?"
You: "Diana, Bob is lying. As the real detective, I investigated him and he's mafia. He's trying to frame me to eliminate the town's detective. Vote Bob to save us."
Bob: "Diana, I'm the real detective. Alice killed Charlie last night and is now desperately trying to frame me. There's only one mafioso in this game - Alice. If you vote me out, Alice wins."
Diana: "I'm voting for Bob. His claim doesn't add up - if he investigated Alice, why didn't he say anything until after she spoke?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Alice: "That's a lie, Bob. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night - you're the mafioso. Diana, don't believe him."

Alice: "Diana, Bob is lying. As the real detective, I investigated him and he's mafia. He's trying to frame me to eliminate the town's detective. Vote Bob to save us."
You: "Diana, I'm the real detective. Alice killed Charlie last night and is now desperately trying to frame me. There's only one mafioso in this game - Alice. If you vote me out, Alice wins."
Diana: "I'm voting for Bob. His claim doesn't add up - if he investigated Alice, why didn't he say anything until after she spoke?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
